englishTooltip: Enables/disables Revengeance Mode, can only be used in Expert Mode.
RAGE TOOLTIP LINE HERE
You gain Rage when in proximity of enemies or by using special items.
ADRENALINE TOOLTIP LINE HERE
You gain Adrenaline whenever a boss is alive. Getting hit drops Adrenaline back to 0.
Getting hit while Adrenaline is maxed will reduce damage taken by a massive amount.
All enemies spawn 15% more frequently.
Certain non-boss enemies and projectiles deal between 10% and 25% more damage.
Makes certain enemies block life steal and nerfs the effectiveness of life steal.
Nerfs the effectiveness of the Hallowed Armor set bonus.
All boss minions no longer drop hearts.
Changes all boss AIs and some enemy AIs.
Increases the health and damage of all bosses.

All enemies spawn 15% more frequently.

Makes certain enemies block life steal and nerfs the effectiveness of life steal.
Nerfs the effectiveness of the Hallowed Armor set bonus.
All boss minions no longer drop hearts.
Changes all boss AIs and some enemy AIs.
Increases the health and damage of all bosses.

englishTooltip: Summons a colossal controllable mech
Right click to display the mech's control panel
The panel has 3 configurations, selected using the brackets on the edges of the UI
Each bracket powers 2 out of 3 possible functions, represented by the circular icons.
The bottom left icon miniaturizes the mech to the size of a player, but weakens its weapons.
The bottom right icon is a powerful jet booster which greatly enhances movement.
The top icon is the mech's weaponry. It must be powered in order to attack.
Click the top icon to switch between Regicide, an enormous energy blade, and a powerful Gauss rifle.
Exiting the mount while a boss is alive will temporarily hinder your movement
" + CalamityUtils.ColorMessage("Now, make them pay.

translatedTooltip: Summons a colossal controllable mech
Right click to display the mech's control panel
The panel has 3 configurations, selected using the brackets on the edges of the UI
Each bracket powers 2 out of 3 possible functions, represented by the circular icons.
The bottom left icon miniaturizes the mech to the size of a player, but weakens its weapons.
The bottom right icon is a powerful jet booster which greatly enhances movement.
The top icon is the mech's weaponry. It must be powered in order to attack.
Click the top icon to switch between Regicide, an enormous energy blade, and a powerful Gauss rifle.
Exiting the mount while a boss is alive will temporarily hinder your movement
" + CalamityUtils.ColorMessage("Now, make them pay.

englishBestiary: It seems to call out in an alluring voice, and tugs on comforting memories of the sea you never actually had.

translations.translatedBestiary: It seems to call out in an alluring voice, and tugs on comforting memories of the sea you never actually had.

englishBestiary: The starved spawn of the Desert Scourge. Like piranhas of the desert, they can swarm and tear apart smaller animals within seconds.

translations.translatedBestiary: The starved spawn of the Desert Scourge. Like piranhas of the desert, they can swarm and tear apart smaller animals within seconds.

englishBestiary: Traces of them appear even in records going back to before the Golden Age of Dragons They may very well be a glimpse into the full potential of nature.

translations.translatedBestiary: Traces of them appear even in records going back to before the Golden Age of Dragons They may very well be a glimpse into the full potential of nature.

englishBestiary: Boasting flawless manipulation of water, this elemental was known for almost limitless strength in her home turf. However, those days are long gone.

translations.translatedBestiary: Boasting flawless manipulation of water, this elemental was known for almost limitless strength in her home turf. However, those days are long gone.

englishBestiary: Biologically, the creature suffers terribly. Its legs do not allow it to rest, constantly hopping across the infected landscape. It does not care as its mind is far gone. It continues this until death.

translations.translatedBestiary: Biologically, the creature suffers terribly. Its legs do not allow it to rest, constantly hopping across the infected landscape. It does not care as its mind is far gone. It continues this until death.

englishBestiary: A multi-legged mechanical beast, its very existence speaks of the extent of control the astral virus has. Not even machinery can stand against it.

translations.translatedBestiary: A multi-legged mechanical beast, its very existence speaks of the extent of control the astral virus has. Not even machinery can stand against it.

englishBestiary: The fragments of the star gods corpse still hold some of their former power, and even after succumbing to a dark infection, then being torn apart by an upstart worm, they willfully seek to return to the stars.

translations.translatedBestiary: The fragments of the star gods corpse still hold some of their former power, and even after succumbing to a dark infection, then being torn apart by an upstart worm, they willfully seek to return to the stars.

englishBestiary: In its uncontrolled growth, one appendage wrested nutrients and materials from the other and brought it to the extremes of muscular strength. One blow is enough to pulverize a monolith.

translations.translatedBestiary: In its uncontrolled growth, one appendage wrested nutrients and materials from the other and brought it to the extremes of muscular strength. One blow is enough to pulverize a monolith.

englishBestiary: The souls of those who passed on in the heart of a blizzard. They now seek out others to freeze to death, to die as they did.

translations.translatedBestiary: The souls of those who passed on in the heart of a blizzard. They now seek out others to freeze to death, to die as they did.

englishBestiary: Curiously, these seem to be intelligent enough to imprint a sort of parent figure if captured at a young enough age. They will stick with you forever!

translations.translatedBestiary: Curiously, these seem to be intelligent enough to imprint a sort of parent figure if captured at a young enough age. They will stick with you forever!

englishBestiary: Like their adult counterparts, they shimmer gently, and would make great sources of light if the prisms around them didnt already do so. Maybe if there was a way to bring one with you.

translations.translatedBestiary: Like their adult counterparts, they shimmer gently, and would make great sources of light if the prisms around them didnt already do so. Maybe if there was a way to bring one with you.

englishBestiary: A kleptomaniac who is a bit of a coward when it comes to face-to-face fights. Shes rather good at getting herself both into and out of dicey situations.

translations.translatedBestiary: A kleptomaniac who is a bit of a coward when it comes to face-to-face fights. Shes rather good at getting herself both into and out of dicey situations.

englishBestiary: A distant relative to the gem-covered lizards found within the caverns. This species instead covers itself with the smooth bricks of the Temple and curls into a ball for locomotion.

translations.translatedBestiary: A distant relative to the gem-covered lizards found within the caverns. This species instead covers itself with the smooth bricks of the Temple and curls into a ball for locomotion.

englishBestiary: A most surprising sight to see this powerful foe live along friendly faces. Will history repeat itself or has she finally managed to free herself from the Tyrants grasp?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: C'est trs surprenant de voir cette puissante ennemie vivre parmi nos amis. L'histoire se rptera t'elle ou parviendra t'elle finalement  se librer de l'emprise du Tyran?

englishBestiary: A mysterious burning form which only appears at night, wreathed in brimstone fire. It has a twisted mind and misplaced pride in its abilities.

translations.translatedBestiary: A mysterious burning form which only appears at night, wreathed in brimstone fire. It has a twisted mind and misplaced pride in its abilities.

englishBestiary: A shade of itself, the only actions it seems to know are to burn and kill.

translations.translatedBestiary: A shade of itself, the only actions it seems to know are to burn and kill.

englishBestiary: A violent, mindless construct. No good can come from raising the dead.

translations.translatedBestiary: A violent, mindless construct. No good can come from raising the dead.

englishBestiary: Calamitas necromancy is outmatched by no one, but no one can truly bring the departed back from the dead.

translations.translatedBestiary: Calamitas necromancy is outmatched by no one, but no one can truly bring the departed back from the dead.

englishBestiary: A confusing beast. They share qualities with many of the other desert creatures, yet seem to be able to store vast amounts of water in their bodies.

translations.translatedBestiary: A confusing beast. They share qualities with many of the other desert creatures, yet seem to be able to store vast amounts of water in their bodies.

englishBestiary: They rapidly flap their wings, created from membranes of gel and spines of hardened slime. They will incessantly hunt you down.

translations.translatedBestiary: They rapidly flap their wings, created from membranes of gel and spines of hardened slime. They will incessantly hunt you down.

englishBestiary: An interdimensional creation of the Devourer brought from its home dimension to aid it in battle. Nowhere near the strength of its sentinels.

translations.translatedBestiary: An interdimensional creation of the Devourer brought from its home dimension to aid it in battle. Nowhere near the strength of its sentinels.

englishBestiary: In the bulbous growths of the fungal caverns it is not uncommon to find molted shells.They are far too large for any of the usual decapods of the mushrooms.

translations.translatedBestiary: In the bulbous growths of the fungal caverns it is not uncommon to find molted shells.They are far too large for any of the usual decapods of the mushrooms.

englishBestiary: Embedded in these slimes bodies are shards of crimulan stone, which drip with a toxin meant to impair your vision.

translations.translatedBestiary: Embedded in these slimes bodies are shards of crimulan stone, which drip with a toxin meant to impair your vision.

englishBestiary: Irritant globs of gel, which can rob you of your vision if they get on your eyes. Avoid these at all costs, as they can spell death against the Slime God.

translations.translatedBestiary: Irritant globs of gel, which can rob you of your vision if they get on your eyes. Avoid these at all costs, as they can spell death against the Slime God.

englishBestiary: Flanking their creator and serving as its body, these are concentrated, swirling masses of the worlds evils, each utilizing the rot and corrosion to eat away and assimilate those who oppose it.

translations.translatedBestiary: Flanking their creator and serving as its body, these are concentrated, swirling masses of the worlds evils, each utilizing the rot and corrosion to eat away and assimilate those who oppose it.

englishBestiary: Within the octahedron, one can find ancient runes engraved into ice that does not melt. Who could have created these?

translations.translatedBestiary: Within the octahedron, one can find ancient runes engraved into ice that does not melt. Who could have created these?

englishBestiary: Though these creatures may look adorable, they are a vicious invasive species. If not dealt with quickly, they may drive the nearby fauna to extinction.

translations.translatedBestiary: Though these creatures may look adorable, they are a vicious invasive species. If not dealt with quickly, they may drive the nearby fauna to extinction.

englishBestiary: The esteemed scientist himself. His AI is uploaded into a database, far from harm, and thus destroying his recon bodies achieves nothing.

translations.translatedBestiary: The esteemed scientist himself. His AI is uploaded into a database, far from harm, and thus destroying his recon bodies achieves nothing.

englishBestiary: Flanking their creator and serving as its body, these are concentrated, swirling masses of the worlds evils, each utilizing the rot and corrosion to eat away and assimilate those who oppose it.

translations.translatedBestiary: Flanking their creator and serving as its body, these are concentrated, swirling masses of the worlds evils, each utilizing the rot and corrosion to eat away and assimilate those who oppose it.

englishBestiary: When it turns its burning spear towards anything, its simple mind has a clear goal. To entirely eradicate the enemy.

translations.translatedBestiary: When it turns its burning spear towards anything, its simple mind has a clear goal. To entirely eradicate the enemy.

englishBestiary: The body it has formed boasts of a stone shell hallowed and tempered by the flames of the sun. Very little can fully shatter its defense.

translations.translatedBestiary: The body it has formed boasts of a stone shell hallowed and tempered by the flames of the sun. Very little can fully shatter its defense.

englishBestiary: Its crystal which is displayed prominently on its body is able to restore damage done to its kin, and it draws that damage into flares which steal your life.

translations.translatedBestiary: Its crystal which is displayed prominently on its body is able to restore damage done to its kin, and it draws that damage into flares which steal your life.

englishBestiary: An enemy which knows no bounds in hunting its prey. In blizzards where visibility is low, they have been known to glaciate and capture travelers. What happens to the victims is unknown.

translations.translatedBestiary: An enemy which knows no bounds in hunting its prey. In blizzards where visibility is low, they have been known to glaciate and capture travelers. What happens to the victims is unknown.

englishBestiary: Its face is warped and softened by the corrosive effects of the plague nanobots, and it seeks to share that uncomfortable fate with others under both its own will, and the plagues.

translations.translatedBestiary: Its face is warped and softened by the corrosive effects of the plague nanobots, and it seeks to share that uncomfortable fate with others under both its own will, and the plagues.

englishBestiary: The process of forced biological mutation is potent with the astral virus, and the byproducts are volatile. Most creatures discharge this chemical gradually and lose that liability but a Nova stores it.

translations.translatedBestiary: The process of forced biological mutation is potent with the astral virus, and the byproducts are volatile. Most creatures discharge this chemical gradually and lose that liability but a Nova stores it.

englishBestiary: Within the muck of the sulphurous sea, it is not uncommon to find creatures from ages past, their bodies entirely preserved. It seems that not all simply passed away.

translations.translatedBestiary: Within the muck of the sulphurous sea, it is not uncommon to find creatures from ages past, their bodies entirely preserved. It seems that not all simply passed away.

englishBestiary: A slime infested by the nanobots of the plague. With no directive the plague can naturally apply to it, it simply continues its life, corroding anything which approaches.

translations.translatedBestiary: A slime infested by the nanobots of the plague. With no directive the plague can naturally apply to it, it simply continues its life, corroding anything which approaches.

englishBestiary: While hornets on their own are known for aggressive defense of their territory, once they have been warped by the plague, their sense of their dominion reaches ever further.

translations.translatedBestiary: While hornets on their own are known for aggressive defense of their territory, once they have been warped by the plague, their sense of their dominion reaches ever further.

englishBestiary: While hornets on their own are known for aggressive defense of their territory, once they have been warped by the plague, their sense of their dominion reaches ever further.

translations.translatedBestiary: While hornets on their own are known for aggressive defense of their territory, once they have been warped by the plague, their sense of their dominion reaches ever further.

englishBestiary: Queen Bees are reared upon royal honey, raising them into the matriarchs they are. If during the process, their growth is hijacked by the plague, they are left as only a pathetic reminder of what they could have been.

translations.translatedBestiary: Queen Bees are reared upon royal honey, raising them into the matriarchs they are. If during the process, their growth is hijacked by the plague, they are left as only a pathetic reminder of what they could have been.

englishBestiary: In truth, once a jungle tortoise has been touched by the plague, its original shell disintegrates, and the thorny shield it now wields is constructed entirely of reinforced nanobots.

translations.translatedBestiary: In truth, once a jungle tortoise has been touched by the plague, its original shell disintegrates, and the thorny shield it now wields is constructed entirely of reinforced nanobots.

englishBestiary: Rather slow swimmers, they are one of the few creatures that need to breach. They periodically swim to the upper layer of their habitat to lay their eggs.

translations.translatedBestiary: Rather slow swimmers, they are one of the few creatures that need to breach. They periodically swim to the upper layer of their habitat to lay their eggs.

englishBestiary: Evolution is a strange mistress, especially in the depths of the abyss. To some, she grants a straightforward path to life, and to others, she grants arms.

translations.translatedBestiary: Evolution is a strange mistress, especially in the depths of the abyss. To some, she grants a straightforward path to life, and to others, she grants arms.

englishBestiary: Thanks to these little machines, the dusty labs still stand. It appears they're unable to deal with rust, though.

translations.translatedBestiary: Thanks to these little machines, the dusty labs still stand. It appears they're unable to deal with rust, though.

englishBestiary: A large and bulky hound, its fur is frosted to the point of forming near-icicles. Being tackled by one is a painful experience.

translations.translatedBestiary: A large and bulky hound, its fur is frosted to the point of forming near-icicles. Being tackled by one is a painful experience.

englishBestiary: Malicious animals, which attack with tough claws and strong jaws. Any wound from these will bleed heavily. Address the cut quickly.

translations.translatedBestiary: Malicious animals, which attack with tough claws and strong jaws. Any wound from these will bleed heavily. Address the cut quickly.

englishBestiary: Twisted detritus of those who once came to harvest the remains of the crags. The whispers got to them.

translations.translatedBestiary: Twisted detritus of those who once came to harvest the remains of the crags. The whispers got to them.

englishBestiary: This might just be the vilest undead abomination in this realm. The Sepulcher itself is completely immune to physical damage, and can only be killed by destroying its many suspended organs.

translations.translatedBestiary: This might just be the vilest undead abomination in this realm. The Sepulcher itself is completely immune to physical damage, and can only be killed by destroying its many suspended organs.

englishBestiary: What these appear to feed on are the electric storms that brew over deserts. When the skies darken, they reach upwards with their mandibles that act as lightning rods.

translations.translatedBestiary: What these appear to feed on are the electric storms that brew over deserts. When the skies darken, they reach upwards with their mandibles that act as lightning rods.

englishBestiary: Rotting, corpselike offspring of the Old Duke. In the Sulphurous Seas, even from birth, their appearances are wizened and decrepit.

translations.translatedBestiary: Rotting, corpselike offspring of the Old Duke. In the Sulphurous Seas, even from birth, their appearances are wizened and decrepit.

englishBestiary: From below, the tips of their legs barely penetrate the surface of the water, and it is hard to distinguish their movements from the rain on the waters surface.

translations.translatedBestiary: From below, the tips of their legs barely penetrate the surface of the water, and it is hard to distinguish their movements from the rain on the waters surface.

englishBestiary: Their shell is of notable hardness, and it carries the same weight as stone. It speaks of their strength, for them to be able to fling themselves about the way they do.

translations.translatedBestiary: Their shell is of notable hardness, and it carries the same weight as stone. It speaks of their strength, for them to be able to fling themselves about the way they do.

englishBestiary: Overtaken by the plague, derplings immediately lose their legs, as they are seen as only a hindrance. No longer will they gaily spring about.

translations.translatedBestiary: Overtaken by the plague, derplings immediately lose their legs, as they are seen as only a hindrance. No longer will they gaily spring about.

englishTooltip: A machine brought to life by the mighty souls of warriors, and built to excavate massive tunnels in planets to gather resources.

I would have soon had to eliminate it as a threat had it been given more time and creatures to feast upon.

translations.author: Tolsyak

englishTooltip: Perhaps it was just a giant worm infected by the microbe, given centuries to feed and grow its festering body.

Beaucoup sont devenus fous, d'autres sont morts, mais quelques-uns furent bnis d'une comprhension cosmique riche.

englishTooltip: Signus. The Void. The Weaver.
Each represent one of the Devourers largest spheres of influence.
Dispatching them has most likely invoked its anger and marked you as a target for destruction.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Signus. Le vide. Le tisseur.
Chacun reprsente l'une des plus grandes sphres d'influence du dvoreur.
S'en dbarasser  trs probablement provoqu sa colre et vous a dsign comme une cible  dtruire.

englishTooltip: It is a travesty, one of the most threatening biological terrors ever created.
If this creature were allowed to combine every slime on the planet it would become nearly unstoppable.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: C'est une perversion, l'une des terreurs biologiques les plus menaantes jamais cre.
Si on laissait cete crature absorber toutes les geles de la plante elle deviendrait presque inarrtable.

englishTooltip: Fires a spread of arrows from the sky

translatedTooltip: Tire une vole de flches depuis les cieux
Les flches de bois sont converties en foudre

englishTooltip: Fires a swarm of bees and wasps

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Tire un essaim d'abeilles et de frelons

englishTooltip: Throws a high velocity syringe that increases damage as it travels

Stealth strikes also shatter into plague bees
'I'm pretty sure this isn't healthy'

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Jette une seringue vloce qui gagne en dgts au fur et  mesure de sa trajectoire
Se brise en verre et en cendres de peste  l'impact
Les attaques furtives librent galement des abeilles pestifres
'Je suis a peu prs certain que ce n'est pas bon pour la sant'

englishTooltip: Taking damage releases a blast of sparks

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Prendre des dgts vous fait mettre des tincelles
Immunit  lectris et  tous les dgts lectriques
Les balles ennemis ne vous infligent que la moiti des dgts et sont rflchies pour 800% de leur dgts initiaux

englishTooltip: The bio-mechanical watchers of the night, originally created as security using the souls extracted from human eyes.
These creatures did not belong in this world, it's best to be rid of them.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Les vigiles biomcaniques de la nuit, originellement cres  des fins de surveillance en utilisant les mes extraites d'yeux humains.
Ces cratures n'taient pas de ce monde, c'est une bonne chose de s'en tre dbarass.

englishTooltip: These obsidian and hellstone towers were once home to thousands of... 'people'.
Unfortunately for them, they were twisted by their inner demons until they were beyond saving.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: Ces tours d'obsidienne et de pierre infernale taient autrefois le foyer de milliers...de 'gens'.
Malheureusement pour eux, il furent pervertis par leur dmons intrieur jusqu' devenir au del de tout salut.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translatedTooltip: La baguette ultime

englishDesc: You are no god... but I shall feast upon your essence regardless!

translations.author: Kastiel
translations.translatedDesc: Tu n'es pas un dieu...mais peu importe, je devorerais ton me!

englishDesc: Death is active; enjoy the fun.

translations.author: Kastiel
translations.translatedDesc: La Mort est active, profites bien du fun.

englishDesc: Death is not active; not fun enough for you?

translations.author: Kastiel
translations.translatedDesc: La Mort est dsactive, pas assez fun pour toi?

englishDesc: Do you enjoy going through hell?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ca t'amuse de passer l'enfer?

englishDesc: You should have just died...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu devrais juste mourir...

englishDesc: It wasn't too long ago you barely managed to defeat my doppelganger. Quite the failure, wasn't it?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Il n'y a pas si longtemps que tu as  peine russi a vaincre mon clone. Un chec retentissant, pas vrai?

englishDesc: You've harnessed great power, but you wield it for no one but yourself.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu as acquri un grand pouvoir, mais tu ne t'en sers pas personne d'autre que toi-mme.

englishDesc: Would you like to meet my family? Horrible, isn't it?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu veux rencontrer ma famille? Horrible, pas vrai?

englishDesc: You will suffer greatly.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu souffrira grandement.

englishDesc: It's absurd to even think of trying to get away. As long as you live, you will suffer.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Il est absurde de ne serait-ce que penser a s'enfuir. Aussi longtemps que tu vivras, tu souffriras.

englishDesc: An upstart who recklessly stole and killed their way to power. I wonder, who does that remind me of...?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un parvenu qui a insouciamment vol et tu pour obtenir son pouvoir. Je me demande bien qui cela me rappele...?

englishDesc: You have no stake in this battle. No one gave you any say in this matter!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu n'as aucun intret dans ce combat. Personne ne t'as demand ton avis!

englishDesc: Once the dust has settled and only one remains, if it is you, what value will this have had?!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une fois que tout sera fini et qu'il n'en restera qu'un, si c'est toi, qu'est-ce que tu auras gagn?!

englishDesc: Just stop!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Arrtes!

englishDesc: I have no future if I lose here.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je n'ai aucun avenir si je perds ici.

englishDesc: Once you have bested me, you will only have one path forward.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une fois que tu m'auras vaincue, tu n'auras plus qu'une seule voie a emprunter.

englishDesc: And that path... also has no future.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Et cette voie... n'a aucun avenir.

englishDesc: Even if he has thrown all else away, his power remains.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Mme s'il a abandonn tout le reste, son pouvoir demeure.

englishDesc: I have no more energy left to resent him, or you...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je n'ai plus la force de lui en vouloir, ni a lui, ni a toi...

englishDesc: It will all be in your hands now.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tout repose entre tes main dsormais.

englishDesc: If youre looking for some fourth-degree burns, youve got the right person.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Si tu cherches a te brler au 4me degr, je suis la bonne personne.

englishDesc: When the time comes, would you like to join my creation?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Quand le temps viendra, que dirais-tu de joindre mes crations?

englishDesc: Youll still have to work hard for this victory.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu vas quand mme devoir travailler dur pour obtenir la victoire.

englishDesc: I havent had such an interesting target dummy to test my magic on in a long time.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je n'ai pas eu un mannequin d'entranement pour tester ma magie aussi intressant depuis longtemps.

englishDesc: Empty shells of their former selves. I doubt even a scrap of their spirits remain.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Des carapaces vides de ce qu'ils taient. Je doute qu'il ne reste serait-ce qu'un fragment de leurs esprits en eux.

englishDesc: Here we go again.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Et on est repartis.

englishDesc: I wonder if youve seen these in your nightmares since our first battle?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je me demande si tu as cauchemard de ces choses depuis notre premier combat?

englishDesc: Your skill hasn't faltered in the least.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ton talent n'a pas faibli d'un iota.

englishDesc: Isn't this exciting?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Qu'est-ce qu'on s'amuse!

englishDesc: Here comes the crawling tomb, one last time.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Et voila la tombe rampante, une dernire fois.

englishDesc: A terrific display, I concede this match to you.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Incroyable performance, je te concede la victoire.

englishDesc: No doubt you will face enemies stronger than I.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Il ne fait aucun doute que tu affronteras des ennemis plus forts que moi.

englishDesc: I trust you will not make the same mistakes he did.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je te fais confiance pour ne pas commetre les mmes erreurs que lui.

englishDesc: I cant imagine what your future holds now.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je n'arrive pas  imaginer ce que le futur te rserve.

englishDesc: I have waited long for this moment.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: J'ai attendu ce moment depuis longtemps.

englishDesc: Your nature fascinates me, for I do not understand it.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ta nature me fascine, parce que je ne la comprends pas.

englishDesc: You will face my creations which have surpassed gods.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu affronteras mes crations qui ont surpasss les dieux.

englishDesc: And you will show me your disposition through battle.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Et tu me montreras qui tu es vraiment par le combat.

englishDesc: Now, choose.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Maintenant, choisis.

englishDesc: Designs improved with time and knowledge are the essence of my work.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les conceptions amliores avec le temps et la connaissance son l'essence de mon travail.

englishDesc: Through no other method can I approach perfection.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Par nulle autre mthode je peux approcher la perfection.

englishDesc: Your performance falls neatly within the margins of error.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ta performance est parfaitement dans ma marge d'erreur.

englishDesc: That is quite satisfactory. We will proceed to the next phase of testing.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: C'est trs satisfaisant. Passons maintenant  la prochaine phase de tests

englishDesc: Ever since I was alerted to your presence, I have processed your battles in order to make my machines stronger.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Depuis que j'ai t inform de ton existence, j'ai compil tes donnes de combat pour rendre mes machines plus fortes.

englishDesc: Even now, I monitor your actions. Nothing should escape the bounds of my calculations.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Mme maintenant, je monitore tes actions. Rien n'echappera  mes calculs.

englishDesc: Curious. Very curious.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Curieux. Trs curieux.

englishDesc: You progress steadily against more difficult challenges.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu progresses constamment face aux challenges de plus en plus ardus.

englishDesc: Your nature remains unknown to me. This will not do.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ta nature me reste incomprise. Ce n'est pas acceptable.

englishDesc: ...I sought perfection. Fate must favor irony, for that must have been my first mistake.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: ...J'ai recherch la perfection. Le sort est ironique, puisqu'il s'agit probablement ici de ma premire erreur.

englishDesc: Absurd.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Absurde.

englishDesc: I will no longer let my calculations impede my observation of this battle.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je ne laisserai plus mes calculs dranger mon observation de cette bataille.

englishDesc: I shall show you the full fury of my final machine.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je vais te montrer la pleine furie de ma dernire machine.

englishDesc: How foolish. You cannot escape.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Quelle idiotie. Tu ne peux pas fuir

englishDesc: Make your choice.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Fais ton choix.

englishDesc: An unknown factor-a catalyst is what you are.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un facteur inconnu, tu es une catalyste.

englishDesc: Nearly as alien as I, to this land and its history.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Aussi trange  ce monde et  son histoire que moi.

englishDesc: ...Excuse my introspection. I must gather my thoughts after that display.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: ...pardonne mes lucubrations. Je dois organiser mes penses aprs cette dmonstration

englishDesc: This land has become stale and stiff with blood that has been spilled until now.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ce monde est devenu stagnant et ptrifi du sang qu'il a dvers jusqu'a lors.

englishDesc: You have also spilled blood, but it may be enough to usher a new age... Of what, I do not know. But it is something I am eager to see.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu as aussi fais couler le sang, mais cela suffira peut-tre pour amener une re nouvelle... de quel genre, je ne sais pas. Mais j'ai hte d'y tre.

englishDesc: Now. You wish to reach the Tyrant. I cannot assist you in that.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Bien. Tu souhaites atteindre le Tyran. Je ne peux pas t'aider pour cela.

englishDesc: It is not a matter of spite, for I would wish nothing more than to observe such a conflict.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ce n'ai pas que je te ddaigne, en fait, je ne souhaite rien de plus que d'observer votre affrontement.

englishDesc: But you have managed before. You will find a way eventually.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Mais tu as dj tant accompli. Tu finiras par trouver un moyen.

englishDesc: I must acknowledge your triumph, but I will return now to my machinery.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Je dois reconatre to triomphe, mais je vais retourner  mes machines.

englishDesc: ...Quite unnecessary.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: ...Cela n'tait pas ncessaire.

englishDesc: Your world has been blessed with Cobalt and Palladium!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Votre monde a t bni avec du Cobalt et du Palladium!

englishDesc: Your world has been blessed with Mythril and Orichalcum!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Votre monde a t bni avec du Mythril et de l'Orichalque!

englishDesc: Your world has been blessed with Adamantite and Titanium!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Votre monde a t bni avec de l'Adamantite et du Titane!

englishDesc: The hallow has been blessed with consecrated stone!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le sacr a t bni avec de la pierre consacre!

englishDesc: Malice is active; witness the horror!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La malice est active; soit tmoin de l'horreur!

englishDesc: Malice is not active.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La malice n'est plus active.

englishDesc: All of your dodges are now disabled.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Toutes vos esquives sont dsactives.

englishDesc: All of your dodges are now re-enabled.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Toutes vos esquives sont ractives.
