englishDesc: The ground is glittering with cyan light.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le sol brille d'une lumire cyan.

englishDesc: The ice caves are crackling with frigid energy.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les cavernes de glace crpitent d'nergie frigide.

englishDesc: Energized plant matter has formed in the underground.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: De la matire vgtale nergise s'est forme dans les souterrains.

englishDesc: Fossilized tree bark is bursting through the jungle's mud.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: De l'corce d'arbre fossilise surgit de la boue de la jungle.

englishDesc: A godly aura has blessed the world's caverns.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une aura divine a bni les cavernes du monde.

englishDesc: A cold and dark energy has materialized in space.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une nergie froide et sombre s'est matrialise dans l'espace.

englishDesc: The Sunken Sea trembles...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La Mer Ensevelie tremble...

englishDesc: A blood red inferno lingers in the night...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un enfer rouge sang subsiste la nuit...

englishDesc: The sulphuric sky darkens...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le ciel sulfurique s'assombrit...

englishDesc: The ocean depths are trembling.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les profondeurs de l'ocan tremblent.

englishDesc: A plague has befallen the Jungle.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une peste s'est rpandue dans la jungle.

englishDesc: The profaned flame blazes fiercely!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La flame profane flamboie frocement!

englishDesc: Cosmic terrors are watching...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les terreurs cosmiques vous observent...

englishDesc: PLAGUE NUKE BARRAGE ARMED, PREPARING FOR LAUNCH!!!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: BARRAGE CHIRURGICAL DE PESTE ARM, PRPARATION AU LANCEMENT!!!

englishDesc: MISSILES LAUNCHED, TARGETING ROUTINE INITIATED!!!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: MISSILES LANCS, ROUTINE DE CIBLAGE INITIE!!!

englishDesc: The air is burning...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: L'air s'embrase...

englishDesc: Shrieks are echoing from the dungeon.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Des hurlements font cho depuis le donjon.

englishDesc: The calamitous beings have been inundated with bloodstone.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les tres calamiteux ont t inonds de pierre de sang.

englishDesc: The Profaned Goddess has recognised your devotion to purity!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La Desse Profane a reconnu votre dvotion  la puret!

englishDesc: The abyssal spirits have been disturbed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les esprits abyssaux ont t drangs.

englishDesc: Wails echo through the dilapidated dungeon halls...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Des chos de gmissents traversent les salles dilapids du donjon...

englishDesc: Long-dead prisoners seek their zealous revenge...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Des prisonniers mort depuis longtemps rclament fervemment leur vengeance...

englishDesc: The souls released stir the acidic storms...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les mes relches agitent les temptes acides...

englishDesc: Don't get cocky, kid!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Reste  ta place, gamin!

englishDesc: A fatal mistake!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une erreur fatale!

englishDesc: Good luck recovering from that!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Bonne chance pour rcuprer de a!

englishDesc: Delicious...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Dlicieux...

englishDesc: Did that hurt?

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Ca t'a fait mal?

englishDesc: Nothing personal, kid.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Rien de personnel, gamin.

englishDesc: Of all my segments to get hit by...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: De toutes mes parties, tu te fais toucher par celle-la...

englishDesc: It's not over yet, kid!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: C'est pas termin, gamin!

englishDesc: A GOD DOES NOT FEAR DEATH!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: UN DIEU NE CRAINT PAS LA MORT!

englishDesc: The frigid moon shimmers brightly.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La lune frigide scintille brillament.

englishDesc: The harvest moon glows eerily.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La lune des moissons brille de manire inquitante.

englishDesc: A star has fallen from the heavens!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une toile est tombe des cieux!

englishDesc: The astral enemies have been empowered!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les ennemis astraux ont t renforcs!

englishDesc: A faint ethereal click can be heard from the dungeon.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un discret cliquetis thr peut-tre entendu depuis le donjon.

englishDesc: The seal of the stars has been broken! You can now mine Astral Ore.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le sceau stellaire a t brise! Vous pouvez miner le Minerai Astral.

englishDesc: A star-spawned horror tunnels through the astral infection.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Une horreur ne des toiles creusent au travers de l'infection astrale.

englishDesc: The god of the stars rejects your offering. The ritual can only be performed at night.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le dieu stellaire rejette ton offrande. Le rituel ne peut tre accompli que la nuit.

englishDesc: You underestimate my power...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu sous-estimes mes pouvoirs...

englishDesc: The brothers have been reborn!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les frres ont t ramens  la vie!

englishDesc: Impressive child, most impressive...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Impressionnant mon enfant, trs impressionnant...

englishDesc: Something stirs in the warm desert sands...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Quelque chose s'agite dans les sables chauds du dsert...

englishDesc: An enormous apex predator approaches...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un enorme prdateur apex s'approche...

englishDesc: The desert sand shifts intensely!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le sable du dsert fluctue intensment!

englishDesc: Cryogen is derping out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Cryogne part en vrille!

englishDesc: The Blood Moon is rising...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La lune sanglante se lve...

englishDesc: The dark sun awaits.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le sombresoleil attend.

englishDesc: My dragon deems you an unworthy opponent. You must acquire the power of the dark sun to witness his true power.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Mon dragon semble juger que tu n'es pas un adversaire digne. Tu dois acqurir le pouvoir du sombresoleil pour librer son vritable pouvoir.

englishDesc: Revengeance is active.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La Revengeance est active.

englishDesc: Revengeance is not active.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: La Revengeance est dsactive.

englishDesc: Bosses will now kill you instantly.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les boss vous tuerons en un coup.

englishDesc: Bosses will no longer kill you instantly.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les boss ne vous tuerons plus en un coup.

englishDesc: You cannot change the rules now.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Tu ne peux pas changer les rgles maintenant.

englishDesc: The air is getting warmer around you.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: L'air se rchauffe autour de toi.

englishDesc: Hmm? Ah, another contender. Very well, may the ritual commence!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Ah, un autre prtendant. Trs bien, que le rituel commence!

englishDesc: Hmm? Oh, you're still alive. Unexpected, but don't get complacent just yet.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Oh, encore vivant. C'est innattendu, mais ne tombe pas dj dans la complaisance.

englishDesc: Hmm? Persistent aren't you? Perhaps you have some hope of prosperity, unlike past challengers.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Persistant, on dirait. Peut-tre que contrairement a tes prdcesseurs, il y a un peu d'espoir que tu prospres.

englishDesc: Hmm? Your perseverance is truly a trait to behold. You've come further than even the demigods in such a short time.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Ta persvrence est vraiment d'un caractre saisissant. Tu es all plus loin que les demi dieux eux-mmes en si peu de temps.

englishDesc: May your skills remain sharp for the last challenges.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Que tes talents restent  leur pinacle pour les dernires preuves.

englishDesc: Hmm? So you've made it to the final tier, a remarkable feat enviable by even the mightiest of the gods.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Alors tu as atteint le dernier niveau, Un fait remarquable, enviable par les plus puissants des dieux.

englishDesc: Go forth and conquer 'til the ritual's end!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Va et conquiert jusqu'a la fin du rituel!

englishDesc: Hmm? You expected a reward beyond this mere pebble? Patience, the true reward will become apparent in time...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Hmm? Tu t'attendais  une rcompense au-del de ce simple caillou? Patience, la vritable rcompense t'apparatra en temps voulu...

englishDesc: Melee weapon proficiency level up!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de mle augmente!

englishDesc: Melee weapon proficiency maxed out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de mle maximise!

englishDesc: Ranged weapon proficiency level up!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de distance augmente!

englishDesc: Ranged weapon proficiency maxed out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de distance maximise!

englishDesc: Magic weapon proficiency level up!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence magique augmente!

englishDesc: Magic weapon proficiency maxed out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence magique maximise!

englishDesc: Summoner weapon proficiency level up!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence d'invocation augmente!

englishDesc: Summoner weapon proficiency maxed out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence d'invocation maximise!

englishDesc: Rogue weapon proficiency level up!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de voleur augmente!

englishDesc: Rogue weapon proficiency maxed out!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Comptence de voleur maximise!

englishDesc: The depths of the underground desert are rumbling...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les profondeurs du dsert souterrain grondent...

englishDesc: The desert wind is blowing furiously!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le vent du dsert souffle furieusement!

englishDesc: You have been blessed by the Third Sage!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Vous avez t bni par le Troisime Sage!

englishDesc: The Third Sage has rescinded its blessing...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le Troisime Sage a rvoqu sa bndiction...

englishDesc: The LORDE is approaching...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Le LORDE approche...

englishDesc: A boomer awaits...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un Boomer attend...

englishDesc: A toxic downpour falls over the wasteland seas!

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Un dluge toxique s'abat sur les mers dvastes!

englishDesc: The sulphuric skies begin to clear...

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedDesc: Les cieux sulfuriques commencent  s'claircir...

englishBestiary: Along its spine runs an undulating dorsal fin which they can put to great use for their streamlined form, as they rush at prey underwater.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Along its spine runs an undulating dorsal fin which they can put to great use for their streamlined form, as they rush at prey underwater.

englishBestiary: Slimes take on the qualities of their environments and after feasting on aerialite ore, this slime has grown wings.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Slimes take on the qualities of their environments and after feasting on aerialite ore, this slime has grown wings.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: A crab that has placed upon its back, a sturdy structure of stone. It is quite strong and displays this extraordinary strength by hurling boulders at those who encroach on its territory.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A crab that has placed upon its back, a sturdy structure of stone. It is quite strong and displays this extraordinary strength by hurling boulders at those who encroach on its territory.

englishBestiary: All head and stomach, they will gorge and guzzle upon vast schools of fish on their own.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: All head and stomach, they will gorge and guzzle upon vast schools of fish on their own.

englishBestiary: A species of scourge which has had its exoskeleton hardened and tempered by years of diving through sulphuric waters for prey. Its own jaws are now imbued with the venom of those seas.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A species of scourge which has had its exoskeleton hardened and tempered by years of diving through sulphuric waters for prey. Its own jaws are now imbued with the venom of those seas.

englishBestiary: A relative of its brethren in the far ocean, this ones spines have been hardened by the sulphuric waters. They drip with the venom they inhabit, so its better to not be struck by them.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A relative of its brethren in the far ocean, this ones spines have been hardened by the sulphuric waters. They drip with the venom they inhabit, so its better to not be struck by them.

englishBestiary: His face shows great age, but also great wisdom. The Archmage once stood against the Jungle Tyrant and paid the price. He sells various frosty wares but of course, keeps the most powerful spells to himself.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: His face shows great age, but also great wisdom. The Archmage once stood against the Jungle Tyrant and paid the price. He sells various frosty wares but of course, keeps the most powerful spells to himself.

englishBestiary: These automated mechanical worms used to dig out the caverns so labs could be built. Thankfully, they are long past their once efficient state, and have not received maintenance in decades.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These automated mechanical worms used to dig out the caverns so labs could be built. Thankfully, they are long past their once efficient state, and have not received maintenance in decades.

englishBestiary: A small animal devoured by the astral infection. The virus retains and shares its experience with itself of devouring other, similar creatures and so, all form identical shells.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A small animal devoured by the astral infection. The virus retains and shares its experience with itself of devouring other, similar creatures and so, all form identical shells.

englishBestiary: It does not show behavior different from any of its gelatinous folk, so this adaptive creature may have been the only one to fight the infection in its own way.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It does not show behavior different from any of its gelatinous folk, so this adaptive creature may have been the only one to fight the infection in its own way.

englishBestiary: An arachnid taken over by the infection, it has lost its ability to spin webs and hosts a myriad of astral growths on its abdomen.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: An arachnid taken over by the infection, it has lost its ability to spin webs and hosts a myriad of astral growths on its abdomen.

englishBestiary: A rare species of coral, one which is able to process and draw nutrients from the waters of the sulphurous sea. During this process, a large amount of volatile gas is formed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A rare species of coral, one which is able to process and draw nutrients from the waters of the sulphurous sea. During this process, a large amount of volatile gas is formed.

englishBestiary: Within their shells, the virus brews a potent chemical. When the seer approaches a foe, it spits this chemical out of its mandibles, hoping to melt the intruders flesh.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Within their shells, the virus brews a potent chemical. When the seer approaches a foe, it spits this chemical out of its mandibles, hoping to melt the intruders flesh.

englishBestiary: A species of angler which has lost any distinguishing feature on its head. Using primitive electroreception similar to sharks, it slowly and methodically hunts its prey.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A species of angler which has lost any distinguishing feature on its head. Using primitive electroreception similar to sharks, it slowly and methodically hunts its prey.

englishBestiary: Heavy, large fish which can easily resist the crushing pressure of the depths and any weapon which might attempt to pierce its tough skin.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Heavy, large fish which can easily resist the crushing pressure of the depths and any weapon which might attempt to pierce its tough skin.

englishBestiary: A ripe-looking worm large enough to curl around your arm. A fish would have to be either mad enough or wise enough, to go after one of these.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A ripe-looking worm large enough to curl around your arm. A fish would have to be either mad enough or wise enough, to go after one of these.

englishBestiary: With the solar energy released from the profaned goddess destruction, uelibloom has sprouted in the jungles mud, and in the slimes which inhabit the biome.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: With the solar energy released from the profaned goddess destruction, uelibloom has sprouted in the jungles mud, and in the slimes which inhabit the biome.

englishBestiary: An immense threat for those who dare venture into the depths. Nearly imperceptible when they choose to be, and lightning-fast when they attack, their jaws can cut through iron plates over half a foot thick.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: An immense threat for those who dare venture into the depths. Nearly imperceptible when they choose to be, and lightning-fast when they attack, their jaws can cut through iron plates over half a foot thick.

englishBestiary: These seemingly inept masses of gelatin are anything but harmless. Let even one of their trailing tentacles brush you, and you will be heavily envenomed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These seemingly inept masses of gelatin are anything but harmless. Let even one of their trailing tentacles brush you, and you will be heavily envenomed.

englishBestiary: Fragments of the brimstone elemental which made their way into shells of slag, their eyes stare mindlessly into the distance, for targets to burn.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Fragments of the brimstone elemental which made their way into shells of slag, their eyes stare mindlessly into the distance, for targets to burn.

englishBestiary: A fallen goddess, past her prime of faithful worshippers. She feels an intense hatred for any being with enough self awareness to pity her.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A fallen goddess, past her prime of faithful worshippers. She feels an intense hatred for any being with enough self awareness to pity her.

englishBestiary: Though these enemies are only a little more threatening than a demon eye, some say that they originally burst from the sockets of those who used to inhabit the capital, when their souls were cursed by the red flames.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Though these enemies are only a little more threatening than a demon eye, some say that they originally burst from the sockets of those who used to inhabit the capital, when their souls were cursed by the red flames.

englishBestiary: Despite retaining a humanoid form, it is not capable of any higher thoughts. It only knows violence.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Despite retaining a humanoid form, it is not capable of any higher thoughts. It only knows violence.

englishBestiary: An animal which adapted to the toxic waters quite naturally. It uses its whiskers to find its way, and its prey in the murky depths.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: An animal which adapted to the toxic waters quite naturally. It uses its whiskers to find its way, and its prey in the murky depths.

englishBestiary: When the fabric of the universe is meddled with, especially by inexperienced beings, the risk of irreparable damage is very, very high.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: When the fabric of the universe is meddled with, especially by inexperienced beings, the risk of irreparable damage is very, very high.

englishBestiary: Anarchistic little devils, they swallow large amounts of water to inflate their bristling bodies. The water within them boils and bursts out in a scalding rush when they are killed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Anarchistic little devils, they swallow large amounts of water to inflate their bristling bodies. The water within them boils and bursts out in a scalding rush when they are killed.

englishBestiary: Lava slimes are the only ones that manage to survive in the heat of hell, having replaced their moisture with liquid rock. That said, their mannerisms are the same, and they seek out and devour anything they can.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Lava slimes are the only ones that manage to survive in the heat of hell, having replaced their moisture with liquid rock. That said, their mannerisms are the same, and they seek out and devour anything they can.

englishBestiary: Sluggish mollusks filter what they can from the brackish water. Their shells are as hard as stone but contain delicate, succulent flesh.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Sluggish mollusks filter what they can from the brackish water. Their shells are as hard as stone but contain delicate, succulent flesh.

englishBestiary: Once, outposts were created in the sky, for ease of worship towards the forces that occupied the clouds in order to please them. Now they lay abandoned and their deity angered.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Once, outposts were created in the sky, for ease of worship towards the forces that occupied the clouds in order to please them. Now they lay abandoned and their deity angered.

englishBestiary: With crushing tentacles that stretch out to over twice the length of a grown man, and toxic black ink, these are formidable predators indeed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: With crushing tentacles that stretch out to over twice the length of a grown man, and toxic black ink, these are formidable predators indeed.

englishBestiary: A curious construct, and though its origins are unknown, it has been decidedly proven that the core of its body leads to somewhere not of our world.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A curious construct, and though its origins are unknown, it has been decidedly proven that the core of its body leads to somewhere not of our world.

englishBestiary: These lanterns allow their user to see through any darkness. They are not typically used for combat.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These lanterns allow their user to see through any darkness. They are not typically used for combat.

englishBestiary: Mushrooms that grow only on Crabulons shell, feasting off the nutrients in the husk. By jolting its body, it flings these off in defense.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Mushrooms that grow only on Crabulons shell, feasting off the nutrients in the husk. By jolting its body, it flings these off in defense.

englishBestiary: Within its calcified shell which has formed against all logic in the sulphurous sea, a gelatinous body stirs. It is also host to a long grappling creature, which helps it grab prey in exchange for protection.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Within its calcified shell which has formed against all logic in the sulphurous sea, a gelatinous body stirs. It is also host to a long grappling creature, which helps it grab prey in exchange for protection.

englishBestiary: Seemingly, these are slimes which have been given the blessing of a higher being, They seek out and devour but not for themselves, which is a rarity among slimes.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Seemingly, these are slimes which have been given the blessing of a higher being, They seek out and devour but not for themselves, which is a rarity among slimes.

englishBestiary: When the release of Cryogens magic slightly thawed the frozen metal which rested underground, the resulting meltwater formed these. Remnants of the ore still reside within them.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: When the release of Cryogens magic slightly thawed the frozen metal which rested underground, the resulting meltwater formed these. Remnants of the ore still reside within them.

englishBestiary: A prismatic living ice crystal. Though typically glimpsed only through the harsh sleet of blizzards, on the rare days where it is seen during a sunny day, its body gleams a deadly, beautiful blue.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A prismatic living ice crystal. Though typically glimpsed only through the harsh sleet of blizzards, on the rare days where it is seen during a sunny day, its body gleams a deadly, beautiful blue.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: A devotee, their mind lost to the raging, hating fires of the brimstone flames. None have ever seen under their hood, and none ever should.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A devotee, their mind lost to the raging, hating fires of the brimstone flames. None have ever seen under their hood, and none ever should.

englishBestiary: Should you feel something brush your legs in the depths of the abyss, it is likely that this is the culprit, tasting the waters for potential prey.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Should you feel something brush your legs in the depths of the abyss, it is likely that this is the culprit, tasting the waters for potential prey.

englishBestiary: Though their core is the same as a hive blob, their armored shell of shadow scale prevents them from dying quite as easily. They also carry a noxious gas within them.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Though their core is the same as a hive blob, their armored shell of shadow scale prevents them from dying quite as easily. They also carry a noxious gas within them.

englishBestiary: One of the many rifts created in the fabric of space by the Ceaseless Void. Some say you could even see a glimpse of another world if you gaze into it.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: One of the many rifts created in the fabric of space by the Ceaseless Void. Some say you could even see a glimpse of another world if you gaze into it.

englishBestiary: It pulses with stagnant, stinking waters of corruption, and leaks as it flies overhead. Wherever those drops land, any organic matter nearby slowly corrodes.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It pulses with stagnant, stinking waters of corruption, and leaks as it flies overhead. Wherever those drops land, any organic matter nearby slowly corrodes.

englishBestiary: If ever before you have peered out into the desert and seen entire dunes rise and fall like the waves of the sea, it is not unlikely that this is the culprit, as it bore through the sands below.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: If ever before you have peered out into the desert and seen entire dunes rise and fall like the waves of the sea, it is not unlikely that this is the culprit, as it bore through the sands below.

englishBestiary: A condensed, volatile stone of brimstone slag. It is said that the souls of many, fighting to get out from within, are what cause it to tear across the ground.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A condensed, volatile stone of brimstone slag. It is said that the souls of many, fighting to get out from within, are what cause it to tear across the ground.

englishBestiary: A sturdy fish, which has spent a long time seething in the Abyss. Males are easily identified by their forward-facing horns, and females by their curled horns.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A sturdy fish, which has spent a long time seething in the Abyss. Males are easily identified by their forward-facing horns, and females by their curled horns.

englishBestiary: A sturdy fish, which has spent a long time seething in the Abyss. Males are easily identified by their forward-facing horns, and females by their curled horns.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A sturdy fish, which has spent a long time seething in the Abyss. Males are easily identified by their forward-facing horns, and females by their curled horns.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: No one knows where she came from, but no one minds her either. Shes a good person to share a drink with, given you dont make her mad.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: No one knows where she came from, but no one minds her either. Shes a good person to share a drink with, given you dont make her mad.

englishBestiary: It is civilizations goal to wrest nature under its control. This is the result of one such conquest, an artificial elemental, run by clockwork gears.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It is civilizations goal to wrest nature under its control. This is the result of one such conquest, an artificial elemental, run by clockwork gears.

englishBestiary: Seemingly, these are slimes which have been given the blessing of a higher being, They seek out and devour but not for themselves, which is a rarity among slimes.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Seemingly, these are slimes which have been given the blessing of a higher being, They seek out and devour but not for themselves, which is a rarity among slimes.

englishBestiary: Highly skilled in the art of spellcasting, these mysterious creatures seem to stand guard like sentinels in watch over something. Approach one close enough and you may be able to make out garbled whispers.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Highly skilled in the art of spellcasting, these mysterious creatures seem to stand guard like sentinels in watch over something. Approach one close enough and you may be able to make out garbled whispers.

englishBestiary: Among any creature ever witnessed, it is these that stray furthest from our understanding. Such grand might, such mystery

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Among any creature ever witnessed, it is these that stray furthest from our understanding. Such grand might, such mystery

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: A stingray that spends much of its time docile on the rocky floors of the sunken seas pools. It stores its energy, and when endangered, can release it in short bursts of speed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A stingray that spends much of its time docile on the rocky floors of the sunken seas pools. It stores its energy, and when endangered, can release it in short bursts of speed.

englishBestiary: With its tin hat upon its head and a dagger that gleams as gold as it does, it marches out into the rain, ready for battle.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: With its tin hat upon its head and a dagger that gleams as gold as it does, it marches out into the rain, ready for battle.

englishBestiary: A normal crab by all means, except for its shell. It has learned to gather the water around it to expel forcefully through its funnel after treatment. It is a dangerous concoction.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A normal crab by all means, except for its shell. It has learned to gather the water around it to expel forcefully through its funnel after treatment. It is a dangerous concoction.

englishBestiary: These creatures do not seek out their food, but rather wait for their meals to come to them. Watch your step if you venture down into the sulphurous sea.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These creatures do not seek out their food, but rather wait for their meals to come to them. Watch your step if you venture down into the sulphurous sea.

englishBestiary: Ambush predators that lay in wait for their prey. They are not particularly strong, and if you come across one, are dispatched with ease.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Ambush predators that lay in wait for their prey. They are not particularly strong, and if you come across one, are dispatched with ease.

englishBestiary: A sand shark that has been taken by the astral infection. Unfamiliar with the origins of the virus, its mind is flooded with information gathered throughout the cosmos, and it thirsts for the plasma of distant stars.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A sand shark that has been taken by the astral infection. Unfamiliar with the origins of the virus, its mind is flooded with information gathered throughout the cosmos, and it thirsts for the plasma of distant stars.

englishBestiary: As the toxins in the water of the sulphurous sea worsen, and the clouds which draw from it grow more hazardous, the slimes become ever more potent.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: As the toxins in the water of the sulphurous sea worsen, and the clouds which draw from it grow more hazardous, the slimes become ever more potent.

englishBestiary: Ethereal jellyfish that drift in the still water of the sunken sea. Their bodies are curiously charged with an electric current.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Ethereal jellyfish that drift in the still water of the sunken sea. Their bodies are curiously charged with an electric current.

englishBestiary: This oversized clam is large enough to entrap a person or two whole. Thankfully, it has only taken turf in the lowest regions of the sunken sea.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: This oversized clam is large enough to entrap a person or two whole. Thankfully, it has only taken turf in the lowest regions of the sunken sea.

englishBestiary: A massive squid, having gained its size from the abundance of prey and little competition in its habitat. Its eyes are specially adapted to seeking out prey in the darkness.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A massive squid, having gained its size from the abundance of prey and little competition in its habitat. Its eyes are specially adapted to seeking out prey in the darkness.

englishBestiary: A turtle that has had its shell encrusted by the filth of the sulphurous sea. For an animal of its size, its jaws have a nearly unmatched biting strength.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A turtle that has had its shell encrusted by the filth of the sulphurous sea. For an animal of its size, its jaws have a nearly unmatched biting strength.

englishBestiary: One wonders if there is a limit to the persistence of sharks in their quest to survive. In the very opposite of their usual climate, they have conquered too. It is a miracle that none yet have grown wings.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: One wonders if there is a limit to the persistence of sharks in their quest to survive. In the very opposite of their usual climate, they have conquered too. It is a miracle that none yet have grown wings.

englishBestiary: Massive in length and in breadth, this eel resides in the deeper caverns of the abyss. Its jaws have the curious ability to hyperextend and swallow nearly any prey it sets its eyes upon.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Massive in length and in breadth, this eel resides in the deeper caverns of the abyss. Its jaws have the curious ability to hyperextend and swallow nearly any prey it sets its eyes upon.

englishBestiary: The membrane of their wings is particularly tough, for material so thin. It has been known to guard them against burns and projectiles as they mercilessly tear at their foes.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The membrane of their wings is particularly tough, for material so thin. It has been known to guard them against burns and projectiles as they mercilessly tear at their foes.

englishBestiary: A human spirit, its mind lost to the blazing orange fires of its dwelling. It seeks out and attempts to eliminate any source of moisture it can detect entering the hellscape.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A human spirit, its mind lost to the blazing orange fires of its dwelling. It seeks out and attempts to eliminate any source of moisture it can detect entering the hellscape.

englishBestiary: These seem to erupt from the caverns of the astral itself. The flesh of their hosts twists into a spiral and countless bodies make up the pulsing flesh of the hive.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These seem to erupt from the caverns of the astral itself. The flesh of their hosts twists into a spiral and countless bodies make up the pulsing flesh of the hive.

englishBestiary: A ball of flesh and rotting matter, it is flung out by the hive mind towards its enemies as fodder, to wear down any who stand in their way.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A ball of flesh and rotting matter, it is flung out by the hive mind towards its enemies as fodder, to wear down any who stand in their way.

englishBestiary: The blemish of a colonial superorganism, the mass of organic matter pulses like a heart. The growth is the result of the corruptions beings forming together.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The blemish of a colonial superorganism, the mass of organic matter pulses like a heart. The growth is the result of the corruptions beings forming together.

englishBestiary: A small creature, one entirely original to the astral infection, save for a tiny core of organic material it takes from the host Hive. They are easily squashed but swarm if endangered.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A small creature, one entirely original to the astral infection, save for a tiny core of organic material it takes from the host Hive. They are easily squashed but swarm if endangered.

englishBestiary: A burning spirit, with no regard or acknowledgment for its surroundings. Anyone who intrudes upon the Profaned Goddess holy grounds will be turned to ash.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A burning spirit, with no regard or acknowledgment for its surroundings. Anyone who intrudes upon the Profaned Goddess holy grounds will be turned to ash.

englishBestiary: Encrusted with gunk that evaporates slowly from the sulphurous sea, these slimes actually form in the upper atmospheres acidic rain, before falling back to the earth.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Encrusted with gunk that evaporates slowly from the sulphurous sea, these slimes actually form in the upper atmospheres acidic rain, before falling back to the earth.

englishBestiary: Perhaps the last of its kind. It could decimate this Jungle in an instant if it wished, however, it seems to take great care in not doing so.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Perhaps the last of its kind. It could decimate this Jungle in an instant if it wished, however, it seems to take great care in not doing so.

englishBestiary: Its eyes are blinded by bacteria that gather in large sacs on its head. As it swims through the waters, relying on primitive echolocation, the bacteria are able to release concussive blasts to clear its path.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Its eyes are blinded by bacteria that gather in large sacs on its head. As it swims through the waters, relying on primitive echolocation, the bacteria are able to release concussive blasts to clear its path.

englishBestiary: This fish has a peculiar defense mechanism. When a threat such as yourself enters its field of view, it releases a shrill pulse alerting others to not its presence but yours.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: This fish has a peculiar defense mechanism. When a threat such as yourself enters its field of view, it releases a shrill pulse alerting others to not its presence but yours.

englishBestiary: A nimble mutation of the astral infection, its many legs allow it to quickly traverse nearly any terrain the infection devours. By swinging its front claws at high speeds, it releases harmful blades of energy.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A nimble mutation of the astral infection, its many legs allow it to quickly traverse nearly any terrain the infection devours. By swinging its front claws at high speeds, it releases harmful blades of energy.

englishBestiary: Should it land a blow with its rounded front claws, it will tear your flesh and shatter your bones. Needless to say, avoid this at all costs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Should it land a blow with its rounded front claws, it will tear your flesh and shatter your bones. Needless to say, avoid this at all costs.

englishBestiary: Sharks are perhaps one of the most resilient and well-adapted species in our planets history. It is no surprise that one of these apex predators has come to thrive in these seas.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Sharks are perhaps one of the most resilient and well-adapted species in our planets history. It is no surprise that one of these apex predators has come to thrive in these seas.

englishBestiary: In the encapsulating darkness of the abyss, a drifting purple light that seems to ignore all physical boundaries is likely one of these. Many even doubt their existence and blame it on the rapture of the deep.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: In the encapsulating darkness of the abyss, a drifting purple light that seems to ignore all physical boundaries is likely one of these. Many even doubt their existence and blame it on the rapture of the deep.

englishBestiary: Their eyes gleam with hunger, and they inhabit the rocks of underwater structures when at rest, only occasionally roaming the open waters.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Their eyes gleam with hunger, and they inhabit the rocks of underwater structures when at rest, only occasionally roaming the open waters.

englishBestiary: Perhaps it was once just a simple crab or perhaps there are plenty of others like it, lurking in the depths. Any answer is sure to make you want to never set foot in the sulphurous sea again.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Perhaps it was once just a simple crab or perhaps there are plenty of others like it, lurking in the depths. Any answer is sure to make you want to never set foot in the sulphurous sea again.

englishBestiary: When threatened underwater they rapidly inflate and bob to the surface. As a last resort, they forcefully burst themselves. Their selfless goal is the prolonged survival of their kin.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: When threatened underwater they rapidly inflate and bob to the surface. As a last resort, they forcefully burst themselves. Their selfless goal is the prolonged survival of their kin.

englishBestiary: A peculiar bony fish many have only ever seen as corpses washed up on a beach, but in their natural habitat, their red fins stream behind them, as they drift in the water column.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A peculiar bony fish many have only ever seen as corpses washed up on a beach, but in their natural habitat, their red fins stream behind them, as they drift in the water column.

englishBestiary: Phantoplasm bulges through the corroded armor in the place of rotting flesh, as this creature reanimated by vengeful spirits treks the caverns of the world.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Phantoplasm bulges through the corroded armor in the place of rotting flesh, as this creature reanimated by vengeful spirits treks the caverns of the world.

englishBestiary: Slimes, from their time spent wobbling about the undergrowth, are full of nutrients, which would well support plant life. Many accept these growths and have been seen to carry blossoms.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Slimes, from their time spent wobbling about the undergrowth, are full of nutrients, which would well support plant life. Many accept these growths and have been seen to carry blossoms.

englishBestiary: A pulsing patch of anarchistic eyes and teeth. It is the culmination of the crimsons flesh and should be avoided at all costs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A pulsing patch of anarchistic eyes and teeth. It is the culmination of the crimsons flesh and should be avoided at all costs.

englishBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

englishBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

englishBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

englishBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Spirits which turned upon one another, cannibalizing others in their mindless frustrated frenzies. There is precedent in the past, for spirits which have devoured enough of others, to grow astoundingly in power.

englishBestiary: Pigs are greedy little beasts. If they come across anything they could barely fathom as food, they will scarf it down in a blink.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Pigs are greedy little beasts. If they come across anything they could barely fathom as food, they will scarf it down in a blink.

englishBestiary: Screaming and crying, a cacophony of spirits in anguish tear through the narrow hallways of the dungeon, searching for morealive or deadto add to their numbers.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Screaming and crying, a cacophony of spirits in anguish tear through the narrow hallways of the dungeon, searching for morealive or deadto add to their numbers.

englishBestiary: A living altar, close to the heart of the Profaned Goddess. From the crystal in its stand, flames lash out into the world, to burn the unfaithful.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A living altar, close to the heart of the Profaned Goddess. From the crystal in its stand, flames lash out into the world, to burn the unfaithful.

englishBestiary: A deity of stone and fire. Her flame burns for one reason alone to cleanse the world of its sinful existence, and to purify those who live upon it.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A deity of stone and fire. Her flame burns for one reason alone to cleanse the world of its sinful existence, and to purify those who live upon it.

englishBestiary: Like many other sea slugs, it ingests toxins from its environments and displays them along its back in a flashy display. The toxins in the sulphurous sea however, are a bit more potent than others.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Like many other sea slugs, it ingests toxins from its environments and displays them along its back in a flashy display. The toxins in the sulphurous sea however, are a bit more potent than others.

englishBestiary: Flames roar from what almost appear to be the parapets of a rotting fortress. You will know when it is approaching downwind, from the smell alone.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Flames roar from what almost appear to be the parapets of a rotting fortress. You will know when it is approaching downwind, from the smell alone.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: The brute force of the Profaned Goddess creations and devotees. Their jaws are filled to the brim with razor-sharp crystals and scorching holy flames.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The brute force of the Profaned Goddess creations and devotees. Their jaws are filled to the brim with razor-sharp crystals and scorching holy flames.

englishBestiary: Strange but mesmerizing creatures, they hide immediately at the sight of any predator. They do not seem to be fully developed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Strange but mesmerizing creatures, they hide immediately at the sight of any predator. They do not seem to be fully developed.

englishBestiary: The Sea King of an ancient civilization long lost to the sands of time and the desert. He is able to give useful advice on the world around you, having lived for so long. He also used to like clams.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The Sea King of an ancient civilization long lost to the sands of time and the desert. He is able to give useful advice on the world around you, having lived for so long. He also used to like clams.

englishBestiary: While they are at the bottom of the food chain, they also make up eighty percent of the biomass in this sea. They nibble away at corpses that fall from the underground desert above.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: While they are at the bottom of the food chain, they also make up eighty percent of the biomass in this sea. They nibble away at corpses that fall from the underground desert above.

englishBestiary: These eels are largely passive and drift languidly through the still waters of the sunken sea. Should you provoke them, they can be stubborn attackers.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: These eels are largely passive and drift languidly through the still waters of the sunken sea. Should you provoke them, they can be stubborn attackers.

englishBestiary: A spiny animal that flings itself about in defense of its territory. If they fling themselves onto landthough relatively helplessthey can make their way back to the ocean.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A spiny animal that flings itself about in defense of its territory. If they fling themselves onto landthough relatively helplessthey can make their way back to the ocean.

englishBestiary: Proof of life in the stars, these were likely once weapons of war, now primitive to their original civilization. They continue to scour the cosmos for hospitable planets, which they attack.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Proof of life in the stars, these were likely once weapons of war, now primitive to their original civilization. They continue to scour the cosmos for hospitable planets, which they attack.

englishBestiary: A figure draped in dark robes and even darker history. No one knows the true form of this creature, though many rumors have been spread.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A figure draped in dark robes and even darker history. No one knows the true form of this creature, though many rumors have been spread.

englishBestiary: Their fins are highly adapted to both water and air, and should one of their reckless charges leave them briefly stranded on land, within a few moments, they will take to the air.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Their fins are highly adapted to both water and air, and should one of their reckless charges leave them briefly stranded on land, within a few moments, they will take to the air.

englishBestiary: Within their shells, the virus brews a potent chemical. When the seer approaches a foe, it spits this chemical out of its mandibles, hoping to melt the intruders flesh.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Within their shells, the virus brews a potent chemical. When the seer approaches a foe, it spits this chemical out of its mandibles, hoping to melt the intruders flesh.

englishBestiary: Guardians were brought together by Calamitas to shield its body from blows. It is possible that they are soul slurpers empowered and enslaved by a different brand of magic than brimstone.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Guardians were brought together by Calamitas to shield its body from blows. It is possible that they are soul slurpers empowered and enslaved by a different brand of magic than brimstone.

englishBestiary: Incomplete, ghoulish skulls, their forms are limited but their devotion boundless. Its likely each yearns for a soul of their own to be complete, whether its given by Calamitas or ripped from the foe they kill.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Incomplete, ghoulish skulls, their forms are limited but their devotion boundless. Its likely each yearns for a soul of their own to be complete, whether its given by Calamitas or ripped from the foe they kill.

englishBestiary: The remnants of a soul which has feasted, been feasted upon, and torn into the souls of others. No one knows how the cycle begins, but you dont want to find out yourself.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The remnants of a soul which has feasted, been feasted upon, and torn into the souls of others. No one knows how the cycle begins, but you dont want to find out yourself.

englishBestiary: Many pincers line the face of this mutation. It will attempt to attach itself to other organic creatures, and lower its mouth to their flesh to feed.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Many pincers line the face of this mutation. It will attempt to attach itself to other organic creatures, and lower its mouth to their flesh to feed.

englishBestiary: It resides high up in the stratosphere, feasting on wyverns and storm swimmers alike, which give it powerful electrokinesis.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It resides high up in the stratosphere, feasting on wyverns and storm swimmers alike, which give it powerful electrokinesis.

englishBestiary: Some creatures which skirt the edges of our atmosphere tend to absorb and channel the suns rays better than others. At any rate, this is a passive creature that means you no harm. You should return the favor.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Some creatures which skirt the edges of our atmosphere tend to absorb and channel the suns rays better than others. At any rate, this is a passive creature that means you no harm. You should return the favor.

englishBestiary: The Brimstone Witch's harsh life can be seen in the magic she casts. Volatile and powerful, yet just barely refined. Her temper is said to be fiery enough to burn down a kingdom.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The Brimstone Witch's harsh life can be seen in the magic she casts. Volatile and powerful, yet just barely refined. Her temper is said to be fiery enough to burn down a kingdom.

englishBestiary: Its otherworldly ego is known as well as its overwhelming power across the land, as in battle it boasts constantly. Admittedly it is one of the few able to back up its claims.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Its otherworldly ego is known as well as its overwhelming power across the land, as in battle it boasts constantly. Admittedly it is one of the few able to back up its claims.

englishBestiary: Known across the land for the swarms that have gathered in the jungle, they are nearly feared above all else in the, as though they may not be quite as dangerous as other forces, they have no master.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Known across the land for the swarms that have gathered in the jungle, they are nearly feared above all else in the, as though they may not be quite as dangerous as other forces, they have no master.

englishBestiary: In the deep trenches of the corruption, infected creatures gather to manifest their own deity. Unlike other cases where smaller beings gather for protection, this is an entirely offensive maneuver.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: In the deep trenches of the corruption, infected creatures gather to manifest their own deity. Unlike other cases where smaller beings gather for protection, this is an entirely offensive maneuver.

englishBestiary: A gargantuan marine reptile that has lurked the ocean depths for almost a millennium. It is unknown if she is the last of her kind, and as despicable as it is, let us pray that she is.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A gargantuan marine reptile that has lurked the ocean depths for almost a millennium. It is unknown if she is the last of her kind, and as despicable as it is, let us pray that she is.

englishBestiary: Despite appearing old and decrepit, it clings to life. It does not seem native to the polluted sea, yet it has taken its place as its apex predator.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Despite appearing old and decrepit, it clings to life. It does not seem native to the polluted sea, yet it has taken its place as its apex predator.

englishBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

englishBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

englishBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Each equipped with a deadly mouthpiece, the different ones are suited for different tasks. One to pierce, one to tear, and another, simply to devour.

englishBestiary: Though birthed by the crimson, it is unknown whether they fully serve that creator. The worms of the hive frequently carve huge tunnels in the crimsons flesh.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Though birthed by the crimson, it is unknown whether they fully serve that creator. The worms of the hive frequently carve huge tunnels in the crimsons flesh.

englishBestiary: Machinery and nanobots have nearly entirely eaten away at the form of this Queen Bee. One wonders if it would simply be more efficient to create one from the ground up.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Machinery and nanobots have nearly entirely eaten away at the form of this Queen Bee. One wonders if it would simply be more efficient to create one from the ground up.

englishBestiary: This creature could easily be confused for a giant amoeba. It seems to be developing past the limitations of an usual slime, thanks to all the compacted biomass it contains.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: This creature could easily be confused for a giant amoeba. It seems to be developing past the limitations of an usual slime, thanks to all the compacted biomass it contains.

englishBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A lizard, its back inundated with crystals. These provide protection, but they are easily spooked and can be harvested for the rare gems upon their backs.

englishBestiary: It spends much of its time finding the most repulsive and disagreeable vegetation for animals to feast upon. Their bellies glow green as they process the chemicals to use in self-defense.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It spends much of its time finding the most repulsive and disagreeable vegetation for animals to feast upon. Their bellies glow green as they process the chemicals to use in self-defense.

englishBestiary: A huge alligator adapted to a life of scavenging in the sulphurous sea. They scrape morsels of food from the bottom with their massive jaws. But do not be mistaken. They will also prey on weak and feeble creatures.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A huge alligator adapted to a life of scavenging in the sulphurous sea. They scrape morsels of food from the bottom with their massive jaws. But do not be mistaken. They will also prey on weak and feeble creatures.

englishBestiary: A rare case of the astral infection creating a harmless creature. They flicker rather prettily, and youre not going to be the only one who thinks so. They make useful bait.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A rare case of the astral infection creating a harmless creature. They flicker rather prettily, and youre not going to be the only one who thinks so. They make useful bait.

englishBestiary: A typically docile animal, it spends much of its time meandering about the rocky outcrops of the abyss. When approached it can become quite aggressive.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A typically docile animal, it spends much of its time meandering about the rocky outcrops of the abyss. When approached it can become quite aggressive.

englishBestiary: It can smell the scent of flesh from far distances and will eagerly squirm its way to the source. Once attached to the host, they rapidly intake blood and discharge venom, both of which heavily disadvantage its prey.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: It can smell the scent of flesh from far distances and will eagerly squirm its way to the source. Once attached to the host, they rapidly intake blood and discharge venom, both of which heavily disadvantage its prey.

englishBestiary: Rotating their small frames, they swoop at potential intruders into a predefined territory that no longer exists. They wander without purpose.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Rotating their small frames, they swoop at potential intruders into a predefined territory that no longer exists. They wander without purpose.

englishBestiary: An orb of wulfrum metal. How it travels is a mystery, though it likely has something to do with its gyroscopic spinning. They fling their bodies at enemies to attack.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: An orb of wulfrum metal. How it travels is a mystery, though it likely has something to do with its gyroscopic spinning. They fling their bodies at enemies to attack.

englishBestiary: Traveling with propulsion that carries them over the ground with ease, they seek out trespassers, though their analysis likely has grown imperceptive with age.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Traveling with propulsion that carries them over the ground with ease, they seek out trespassers, though their analysis likely has grown imperceptive with age.

englishBestiary: A stationary foe, though its function is far from harmless. Within its influence, other wulfrum creations become notably empowered, the curious energy within them, overflowing.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: A stationary foe, though its function is far from harmless. Within its influence, other wulfrum creations become notably empowered, the curious energy within them, overflowing.

englishBestiary: An aged automaton of unknown origins. With an incessant sense of duty and worn frame, they scour the land. Their lamps shine with curious energy.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: An aged automaton of unknown origins. With an incessant sense of duty and worn frame, they scour the land. Their lamps shine with curious energy.

englishBestiary: While it is the most flamboyant of Draedons machines, it appears to be lacking some finish, though this trait does not compromise its killing potential whatsoever.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: While it is the most flamboyant of Draedons machines, it appears to be lacking some finish, though this trait does not compromise its killing potential whatsoever.

englishBestiary: Under every armored plate on this machine lies an advanced weapon. This sacrifices the machines durability, but it makes it a very effective mass murderer.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Under every armored plate on this machine lies an advanced weapon. This sacrifices the machines durability, but it makes it a very effective mass murderer.

englishBestiary: The Exo Twins are the ultimate recon units. Capable of detecting various wavelengths of light unknown to us, nothing can hide.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: The Exo Twins are the ultimate recon units. Capable of detecting various wavelengths of light unknown to us, nothing can hide.

englishBestiary: Within it, burns chemicals with the fury of Greek fire. Highly refined from the design of the eye-like twins before, it is now capable of outstanding mid-air movement.

translations.author: Tolsyak
translations.translatedBestiary: Within it, burns chemicals with the fury of Greek fire. Highly refined from the design of the eye-like twins before, it is now capable of outstanding mid-air movement.

englishDesc: The mini astrageldon slime will protect you

translations.author: Kastiel
translations.translatedDesc: Le mini slime astral vous protgera.
